project.teaser: Developing a Fisheries DataSpace (Fish-X) and ‘Insight Platform – based on smart orchestrated architecture and open interoperable technology via Gaia-X - that will enable users to implement data to improve fishing methods, increase yields, protect endangered fisheries...
project.objective: Developing a Fisheries DataSpace (Fish-X) and ‘Insight Platform – based on smart orchestrated architecture and open interoperable technology via Gaia-X - that will enable users to implement data to improve fishing methods, increase yields, protect endangered fisheries stocks and streamline MCS processes supporting the implemntation of the CFP. The project will also be developing a series of industry and Fisheries agency to consultatively participate in developing and refining new technologies in light of the changes and review of CFP.
project.title: FISH-X- PROVIDING A EUROPEAN FISHERIES DATASPACE THROUGH A CONSULTATIVE APPROACH
project.keywords: Consultative Approach, Fisheries MCS implementation, Just Digital Transition

article.title: Digital innovations for sustainable EU fisheries
article.teaser: Fisheries management needs a digital revamp. Smart tools that empower fishers have the potential to secure and sustain the seafood supply chain.

article.title: Research and innovation for sustainable, climate resilient aquaculture and fisheries

category.description: Article: Collections of results, from finished or nearly completed projects, focusing on a specific theme that you can apply in your domain

article.title: Research and innovation for sustainable, climate resilient aquaculture and fisheries
article.teaser: Aquatic foods comprise animals and plants grown in or harvested from the ocean, lakes and rivers or sustainably farmed. Highly nutritious and with a smaller carbon footprint than land-based crops and livestock, foods from aquatic ecosystems are both good for us and our planet.

result.title: Engagement Reports
result.description: Reports about engagement with stakeholders including fishers to identify and coordinate with initiatives in place for monitoring SSF in Portugal, identifying issues and challenges.

result.title: Insight platform functional definition and use case document
result.description: Insight platform functional definition and use case document will contain functional descriptions for all functions and use interfaces that will be provided in the Insight platform. This document should be understood by various classes of potential users, not an IT document.

result.title: Summary & Best Practices on Discards
result.description: A paper will be developed and shared with the whole consortium on best practices regarding discards.The main goal will be to provide a reliable feedback of the regulation relative to discards. The paper should make diagnoses and propose alternatives or recommendations for improvements.

result.title: Cross-sector Datasets Report
result.description: Cross-sector Datasets Report will contain descriptions of all data sets that will be proposed for display, analysis, download in the Insight platform, including semantic details, fields of description, encoding etc.

result.title: Press Kits (University/Research Organisation, NGOS, Fisheries bodies and Govt about Insight Engine and the Fish-X DataSpace)
result.description: The project will publish a first presskit at month 3 of the project in order to initiate the dialogue with the public about the ambition and objectives of the project.

result.title: Periodic Reporting for period 1 - Fish-X (FISH-X- PROVIDING A EUROPEAN FISHERIES DATASPACE THROUGH A CONSULTATIVE APPROACH)
result.teaser: In the EU, the massive ongoing digital transition creates an opportunity to reconcile environmental and socio-economic issues within the fisheries and seafood sector. Yet, this transition poses particular challenges for small-scale fisheries (SSF). Enhancing the sustainability...

category.title: Report Summary
category.description: Result: Publishable summary (FP7 SESAM) and Summary for publication (H2020 SyGMa)

result.title: Fisheries Industry Roadmap
result.description: At month 6 a preliminary version of a fisheries roadmap will be made availableon the website to the public, as well as a comprehensive full paper at month 33, concluding all majorfindingsand outcomes of the project and industry related activities, including recommendations and bestpractices.

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
